divs: Sighting DetailsNeighbor and I were sitting on front porch deck and noticed a slow moving light which first appeared to be an airplane, but after watching for only 5-10 seconds, we realized that there were no flashing lights or sound which usually accompany airplanes. As we watched, the light, a soft bright yellow point, moved at an angle towards us then turned slowly toward the east. The distance was between 5-15 miles away. I noticed that it was speeding up and said "its speeding up!", by the time I had finished speaking it had sped up and disappeared into the distance. It was kinda like star trek enterprise going into warp but without leaving a trail like on TV, it just went. (I have since replaced the dead batteries that were in my camera.)
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rutledge
This sighting has never been favorited.
